downloadTitle: Conversations Analyzer for Microsoft Lync 2010 Getting Started Guide
downloadDescription: This download provides end-user documentation about the Conversations Analyzer application for Microsoft Lync 2010.
detailsSection: This download provides end-user documentation about Conversations Analyzer for Microsoft Lync 2010.  Conversations Analyzer is an application that reviews your Lync 2010 instant messaging (IM) conversation history and gives you scores for your use of trust-building language in day-to-day communications with business associates and friends. Conversations Analyzer applies trust rules to determine the occurrence of words and phrases that have a positive or negative effect on trust. Only your IM conversation history is reviewed. The results are not uploaded anywhere. The scores are meant to be used only by you.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
